blocks.subject: RE: Confidentiality Agreement
text: ----- Forwarded by Elizabeth Sager/HOU/ECT on 05/31/2001 10:51 AM -----
Brent Hendry@ENRON 05/30/2001 05:02 PM 	   To: Elizabeth Sager/HOU/ECT@ECT  cc: Sanjeev Khanna/Enron@EnronXGate  Subject: RE: Confidentiality Agreement

Below is the one comment from Pacificorp on the CA that I had marked up.  I am attaching the markup I had sent to Pacificorp.  Prior to sending execution copies I thought you might want to look at it in light of the fact that the contingent call option portion of the proposed transactions would likely be a physical deal with EPMI.  I am taking the next two days off but will be back on Monday.
----- Forwarded by Brent Hendry/NA/Enron on 05/30/2001 04:56 PM -----

Sanjeev Khanna/ENRON@enronXgate 05/30/2001 09:33 AM 	   To: "Jeremy D. Weinstein" <jeremy.weinstein@pacificorp.com>@SMTP@enronXgate  cc: Brent Hendry/NA/Enron@Enron, "Mark Klein (E-mail)" <Mark.Klein@Pacificorp.com>@SMTP@enronXgate  Subject: RE: Confidentiality Agreement
I am forwarding this to Brent.
Please feel free to call Brent, if you need further information.

blocks.subject: Re: Confidentiality Agreement
text: Only need one change; I don't have Brent's e-mail address, but  I'll trust Sanjeev to forward this:
"at the time of disclosure or is thereafter  acquired from a source other than the Disclosing Party that was not known  to"

blocks.from: Klein, Mark <Mark.Klein@PacifiCorp.com << File: mailto:Mark.Klein@PacifiCorp.com >> > To:  Weinstein, Jeremy <Jeremy.Weinstein@PacifiCorp.com << File: mailto:Jeremy.Weinstein@PacifiCorp.com >> >
blocks.subject: FW: Confidentiality  Agreement Jeremy:  Can you review draft CA with  Enron for work pertaining to the hydro, thermal and load hedges? Please work  with Enron lawyer, Brent Hendry (713)853-7124. As always your help is  appreciated. Mark Klein
raw_header: Can you review draft CA with  Enron for work pertaining to the hydro, thermal and load hedges? Please work  with Enron lawyer, Brent Hendry (713)853-7124. As always your help is  appreciated.

blocks.subject: Confidentiality Agreement
text: Please find enclosed the marked up copy of the  Confidentiality
I propose that we get introduce our counselors to each other so  that
they can finalize this agreement. Our counselor  is:
Please feel free to call me if you have any questions or need  further
